reviews.text:
Trains ran regularly. 
Place eas clean. Trains were comfortable and clean. Staff eas helpful. Wish they had lifts to not have to manage the stairs to get to the other side of the tracks.

TRAINS FROM BARRY TO CARDIFF CENTRAL UP TO 4 AN HOUR MONDAY TO SATURDAY AND UP TO 3 AN HOUR SUNDAYS..1ST TRAIN FROM BARRY TO CARDIFF CENTRAL MON-SAT IS 05.19AM AND LAST TRAIN TO CARDIFF MONDAY TO SATURDAY IS 23.15.JOURNEY TIME 24 MINUTES AND CURRENT PRICE ADULT DAY RETURN IS £5.30.1ST TRAIN ON SUNDAYS IS AT 09.00 AND LAST TRAIN 23.00.
Always kept clean by the lady who runs the ticket office , and the cafe run by charity volunteers is fab , lots of parking too.
Very smooth, even and level platforns
A dated station but still does what it is need to do but trains are very small in the summer when lots of people are going to barry island .
